text: Theophilus was a Patriarch of Antioch.Eusebius of Caesarea in Ecclesiastical History iv. 20; Jerome Ep. ad Algas. quaest. 6. () He succeeded Eros c. 169, and was succeeded by Maximus I c. 183. These dates are only approximations. His death probably occurred between 183 and 185. == References == Category:Christian saints
title: Theophilus of Antioch
